mapper.select:
select id, threat_source, malicious_ip, attack_cmd, malware_origin, attack_path from threat_source_tracing
and malicious_ip like concat("%",#{maliciousIp},"%")
and threat_source like concat("%",#{threatSource},"%")
order by create_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into threat_source_tracing (threat_source, malicious_ip, attack_cmd, malware_origin, attack_path, flow_charm, create_time) values (#{threatSource}, #{maliciousIp}, #{attackCmd}, #{malwareOrigin}, #{attackPath}, #{flowCharm}, #{createTime})
